setting_msg_restart_required: इस विकल्प को प्रभावी होने के लिए पुनरारंभ की आवश्यकता है।
setting_editor_option_spellcheck_descrip: स्पेल चेक को चालू करता है। अभी के लिए केवल अंग्रेजी (युस) के साथ काम करता है।
setting_editor_spellcheck_languages_desc: वर्तनी-जांचकर्ता के उपयोग के लिए भाषाएँ चुनें।
setting_editor_spellcheck_languages_mac_: मूल वर्तनी जांचकर्ता स्वचालित रूप से macOS पर आपके लिए उपयोग की जा रही भाषा का पता लगाएगा।
setting_editor_option_show_inline_title_: फ़ाइल नाम को फ़ाइल सामग्री के साथ एक संपादन योग्य शीर्षक के रूप में प्रदर्शित करता है।
setting_editor_option_readable_line_leng: पढ़ने के लिए लाइन की लम्बाई
setting_editor_option_readable_line_desc: अधिकतम लाइन लंबाई को सीमित करता है। कम सामग्री स्क्रीन पर फिट करता है, लेकिन लंबे पैराग्राफ को अधिक पढ़ने योग्य बनाता है।
setting_editor_option_strict_line_break_: पूर्वावलोकन मोड में, मार्कडाउन विनिर्देशों के अनुसार सिंगल लाइन ब्रेक को अनदेखा करें। पूर्वावलोकन में दिखाने के लिए सिंगल लाइन ब्रेक के लिए इसे बंद करें।
setting_editor_option_properties_in_docu: चुनें कि संपादक के भीतर गुण कैसे प्रदर्शित किए जाते हैं। गुणों को YAML के रूप में प्रदर्शित करने के लिए "स्रोत" का चयन करें।
setting_editor_option_show_file_properti: फ़ाइल के शीर्ष पर गुण अनुभाग दिखाएँ.
setting_editor_option_auto_pair_brackets: कोष्ठक और उद्धरण-चिन्ह स्वतः बंद करें।
setting_editor_option_auto_pair_markdown: बोल्ड और इटैलिक के लिए प्रतीकों को स्वचालित रूप से जोड़ें।
setting_editor_option_smart_indent_lists: अपने लिए इंडेंटेशन और सूची मार्कर का ध्यान रखें।
setting_editor_option_fold_heading_descr: आपको हर चीज़ को एक शीर्षक के अंतर्गत मोड़ने दें।
setting_editor_option_fold_indent_descri: आपको समान इंडेंटेशन के एक हिस्से, जैसे सूचियाँ, को मोड़ने दें।
setting_editor_option_default_new_tab_vi: नए टैब के लिए डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप
डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप जिसमें एक नया मार्कडाउन टैब खुलता है।
setting_editor_option_open_tab_in_foregr: हमेशा नए टैब पर फोकस करें
जब आप किसी लिंक को नए टैब में खोलें, तो तुरंत उस पर स्विच करें।
setting_editor_option_default_editing_mo: नया फलक डिफ़ॉल्ट संपादन तरीके के साथ प्रारंभ होगा।
setting_editor_option_indentation_guide_: दृश्य मार्गदर्शन के लिए बुलेट बिंदुओं के बीच लंबवत संबंध रेखाएं दिखाएं।
setting_editor_option_use_tabs_descripti: "टैब" बटन दबाते समय इंडेंट करने के लिए टैब का उपयोग करें। रिक्त स्थान का उपयोग करने के लिए इसे बंद पर सेट करें।
setting_editor_option_tab_size_descripti: एक टैब के समतुल्य रिक्त स्थानों की संख्या.
setting_editor_option_rtl_description: नोट्स की टेक्स्ट दिशा को दाएं से बाएं प्रदर्शित करने के लिए सेट करता है।
setting_editor_option_auto_convert_html_: वेबपेजों से चिपकाने और खींचने और छोड़ने पर HTML को स्वचालित रूप से मार्कडाउन में परिवर्तित करें। बिना रूपांतरण के पेस्ट करने के लिए Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V का उपयोग करें।
setting_editor_option_vim_key_bindings_d: आपको स्रोत संपादक में Vim बटन बाइंडिंग का उपयोग करने दें।
setting_editor_option_vim_key_bindings_m: मोबाइल उपकरणों पर, यह सेटिंग प्रति-डिवाइस है और कॉन्फ़िगरेशन फ़ाइल के माध्यम से सिंक्रनाइज़ नहीं की जाती है।
setting_editor_option_emacsy_keys: MacOS के लिए लीगेसी Emacs-शैली बटन बाइंडिंग
setting_editor_option_emacsy_keys_descri: आपको अतिरिक्त Emacs-शैली नेविगेशन बटनो का उपयोग करने की अनुमति देता है, जो macOS पर मानक हैं, लेकिन कुछ प्रमुख संचालन में हस्तक्षेप कर सकते हैं।
setting_editor_label_confirm_enable_vim: विम मोड में प्रवेश की पुष्टि करें
setting_editor_label_vim_warning: Vim मोड कुशल टेक्स्ट संपादन के लिए है लेकिन यह काफी प्रतिकूल हो सकता है। यदि आप Vim से परिचित नहीं हैं, तो यह विकल्प ऐसा दिखा सकता है जैसे ओब्सीडियन ने काम करना बंद कर दिया है।
setting_editor_label_vim_test: यह सत्यापित करने के लिए कि आप Vim के चारों ओर अपना रास्ता जानते हैं, कृपया नीचे सहेजे बिना Vim को छोड़ने का आदेश दर्ज करें:
setting_editor_msg_vim_mode_enabled: आदेश सही है. Vim मोड अब सक्षम है।
setting_editor_msg_vim_mode_not_enabled: आदेश ग़लत है. आपकी सुरक्षा के लिए Vim मोड अक्षम रहता है।
setting_editor_msg_vim_mode_please_enter: कृपया Vim मोड को सक्षम करने के लिए कमांड दर्ज करें
setting_editor_option_legacy_editor_desc: लीगेसी संपादक को जल्द ही हटा दिया जाएगा। वर्तमान में इसका रखरखाव नहीं किया जाता है, और इस प्रकार, बगों का अब समाधान नहीं किया जाएगा।
setting_editor_label_legacy_deprecation_: ओब्सीडियन के पास अब एक बिल्कुल नया संपादक है जो अधिक पुष्ट और सुलभ है।
ऐसा लगता है कि आप अभी भी पुराने संपादक का उपयोग कर रहे हैं, और हमें लगता है कि आप नए संपादक का आनंद लेंगे।
आप किस मोड का उपयोग करना चाहेंगे?
setting_editor_label_live_preview_descri: एक अधिक आधुनिक, आप जो देखते हैं वही अनुभव प्राप्त करते हैं।
setting_editor_label_source_mode_descrip: सिंटैक्स हाइलाइटिंग के साथ अनिर्मित मार्कडाउन देखें।
setting_file_option_confirm_file_deletio: Whether you want to get prompted to confirm file deletion.
setting_file_option_delete_destination_d: What to do with files after you delete them.
setting_file_option_always_update_links_: Whether to automatically update links after renaming a file or prompt.
setting_file_option_new_note_location_de: Where to put newly created notes. Plugin settings will override this.
setting_file_option_choice_current_folde: Same folder as the file is in
setting_file_option_new_file_folder_path: Folder to create new notes in
Newly created notes will appear under this folder. Plugin settings will override this.
setting_file_option_use_wiki_links_descr: Auto-generate Wikilinks for [[links]] and ![[images]] instead of Markdown links and images. Disable this option to generate Markdown links instead.
setting_file_option_show_unsupported_fil: Show files with any extension even if Obsidian can't open them natively, so that you can link to them and see them in File Explorer and Quick Switcher.
setting_file_option_link_autocompleted_f: What links to insert when auto generating internal links.
setting_file_option_new_attachment_locat: Where newly added attachments are placed.
setting_file_option_attachment_folder_pa: Newly created attachment files will appear here. That includes images created via drag and drop or pasting, and audio recordings.
setting_file_option_attachment_subfolder: If your file is under "vault/folder", and your set subfolder name to "attachments", attachments will be saved to "vault/folder/attachments".
setting_file_option_excluded_files_desc: Excluded files will be either hidden or less noticeable in various places, such as Quick Switcher, link suggestion, and Graph View.
setting_file_label_no_excluded_filters_a: No excluded filter is applied right now. Add one below.
setting_file_label_excluded_filters_appl: Files matching the following filters are currently excluded:
setting_appearance_option_base_theme_des: ओब्सीडियन की डिफाल्ट रंग प्रणाली चुनें।
setting_appearance_option_accent_color_d: Choose the accent color used throughout the app.
setting_appearance_option_interface_font: Set base font for all of Obsidian.
setting_appearance_option_zoom_level_des: Controls the overall zoom level of the app.
setting_appearance_option_text_font_desc: Set font for editing and reading views.
setting_appearance_option_monospace_font: Set font for places like code blocks and frontmatter.
setting_appearance_label_multiple_fonts_: The following fonts are currently applied:
setting_appearance_label_no_custom_font_: No custom font is applied right now. Add one below.
setting_appearance_label_font_applied: The first font from this list that is available on your system will be applied.
setting_appearance_msg_font_not_found: This font is not detected on your system.
setting_appearance_msg_font_found: This font is detected on your system.
setting_appearance_option_community_them: कम्युनिटी के द्वारा बनायी गयी अद्भुत थीम्स की समीक्षा करें और प्रयोग करें ।
setting_appearance_option_font_size_desc: Font size in pixels that affects editor and preview.
setting_appearance_option_font_size_acti: Adjust the font size using Ctrl + Scroll, or using the trackpad pinch-zoom gesture.
setting_appearance_option_manage_themes_: Manage installed themes and browse community themes.
setting_appearance_option_native_menus_d: Menus throughout the app will match the operating system. They will not be affected by your theme.
setting_appearance_label_no_css_snippets: No CSS snippets found in the snippets folder.
setting_appearance_option_frame_descript: Determines the styling of the title bar of Obsidian windows. Requires a full restart to take effect.
setting_appearance_option_custom_icon_de: Set a custom icon for the app
setting_appearance_option_configure_ribb: Configure what commands appear in the ribbon menu in that navigation bar.
setting_appearance_option_mobile_quick_r: Tapping on the ribbon item in the navigation menu will active this ribbon item. Tap and hold will still show the menu.
setting_appearance_label_modal_configura: Choose what items you want to be active in the ribbon. Drag and drop to change the order.
setting_appearance_option_show_view_head: Display the header at the top of every tab.
setting_hotkeys_tooltip_hotkey_single_co: यह हॉटकी संघर्ष करता है "{{command}}" कमांड के साथो
setting_hotkeys_tooltip_hotkey_multiple_: यह हॉटकी संघर्ष करता है  {{count}} कमांडो के साथो
setting_about_label_up_to_date: Your app is up to date!
setting_about_label_manual_update_requir: To support the latest features and to receive the latest security patches, Obsidian needs a major installer update. You need to manually download and reinstall Obsidian.
setting_about_label_new_version_ready: A new version is ready to be installed.
setting_about_option_auto_update_descrip: Turn this off to prevent the app from checking for updates.
setting_about_option_insider_build_descr: Auto-update to insider builds to try out new features. Note that these builds are bleeding edge and might be less stable.
setting_about_option_hw_acceleration_des: Turns on Hardware Acceleration, which uses your GPU to make Obsidian smoother.
setting_about_option_hw_acceleration_war: If you turn this off, app performance will be severely degraded.
setting_about_option_config_location_des: Use a different config folder than the default one. Must start with a dot.
setting_about_option_config_location_war: Config location must be a valid folder name that starts with a dot.
setting_about_label_commercial_license_i: Registered to "{{company}}" for {{seats}} users. Valid until {{expiry}}.
setting_about_option_catalyst_desc: You currently have the {{tier}} Catalyst license. Thanks for your support!
setting_about_option_catalyst_desc_no_li: You don't have a Catalyst license right now. Catalyst license is a one-time donation to support Obsidian development.
setting_about_label_add_own_language: See how to add your language to Obsidian.
setting_account_option_your_account_desc: You're not logged in right now. An account is only needed for Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish, and Catalyst insider builds.
setting_account_option_commercial_licens: If you use Obsidian for commercial purpose, you may need to get a commercial license.
setting_account_message_login_failed: लॉगिन विफल, कृपया अपना ईमेल और पासवर्ड दोबारा जांचें।
setting_account_mfa_wrong_format: The 2FA authenticator code must be 6 digits.
setting_account_mfa_verification_failed: 2FA code is incorrect, please double check your authenticator app.
setting_core_plugin_option_search_plugin: Filter plugins by name or description.
setting_third_party_plugin_option_restri: Restricted Mode is off. Turn on to disable community plugins.
setting_third_party_plugin_option_browse: Browse and install third-party plugins made by our amazing community.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_exit_re: Community plugins, like any other software you install, could potentially cause data integrity and security issues.
Plugin security is important to us. Here's what we do:
Despite our efforts, there is still a small chance that a community plugin might misbehave.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_code_re: Plugins undergo an initial code review by our team before they appear in the store.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_open_so: Most plugins are open source on GitHub, so you can inspect the code yourself.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_peer_au: We have a large community of developers who watch out for each other.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_report_: We follow up and remove faulty plugins upon user report.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_exit_re: Would you like to exit Restricted Mode to enable community plugins? We strongly recommend making backups of your data before doing so.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_trust_a: Do you trust the author of this vault?
You're opening this vault for the first time, and it comes with some plugins.
If you obtained this vault from someone else, please note that plugins of unknown origin might pose security risks.
If you do not fully trust the author of this vault, we recommend staying in Restricted Mode, so the plugins in this vault do not run.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_no_rece: No recent files found. Type to search...
setting_third_party_plugin_label_unsuppo: This plugin does not support your device.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_no_read: This plugin did not provide a README file.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_uninsta: Are you sure you want to uninstall this plugin? This will delete the folder of the plugin.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_debug_s: Show a message with how long each plugin took to initialize when starting the app.
setting_third_party_plugin_option_search: Filter installed plugins by name or description.
setting_third_party_plugin_label_donate_: {{name}} का समर्थन करने के लिए दान करें
Plugin developers are community volunteers who make amazing things out of passion. If you find this plugin useful, please consider funding its development.
100% of your contribution will go to the plugin developer; Obsidian does not take a cut. The funding platform they choose might charge a fee.
आपके उदार समर्थन के लिए धन्यवाद!
setting_mobile_toolbar_option_configure_: Configure which command to trigger when pull down from the top. The current command is set to "{{command}}".
setting_mobile_toolbar_option_add_comman: Select any global command to add to the toolbar.
editor_print_modal_caption: Export "{{filename}}" to PDF with the setting below.
interface_empty_sidebar: The sidebar is empty, try dragging a pane here.
interface_msg_file_changed: "{{file}}" has been modified externally, merging changes automatically.
interface_msg_switched_to_read: Switched default view mode to reading view.
interface_msg_switched_to_edit: Switched default view mode to editor.
interface_msg_upgrade_installer: To use this feature, please re-install with latest installer available from our website.
interface_msg_indexing:
Obsidian is indexing your vault...
This should only happen once.
Some functionality may not be available until this is complete.
interface_msg_sandbox_vault:
This is a sandbox vault.
Changes you make in this vault will be lost.
interface_msg_tab_busy: This tab is currently busy, please try again later
interface_empty_state_unknown_pane_desc: The plugin that created this pane ({{type}}) has gone away
interface_menu_edit_view: Edit (Ctrl/Cmd+Click to edit in new pane)
interface_tooltip_click_to_expand: बड़ा करने के लिए क्लिक करे
interface_tooltip_click_to_collapse: छोटा करने के लिए क्लिक करे
interface_tooltip_not_created_yet: Not created yet, select to create
interface_start_screen_option_open_folde: Choose an existing folder of Markdown files.
interface_start_screen_option_create_vau: Create a new Obsidian vault under a folder.
interface_start_screen_option_connect_ob: Set up a synced vault with existing remote vault.
interface_start_screen_option_new_vault_: Pick a name for your awesome vault.
Pick a place to put your new vault.
interface_start_screen_label_new_vault_l: Your new vault will be placed in:
interface_start_screen_msg_error_rename_: There is already a vault with this name.
interface_start_screen_msg_error_nested: Cannot move vault into a subfolder of itself.
interface_start_screen_msg_error_rename_: Can't rename a currently open vault.
interface_start_screen_msg_error_move_ex: There is already a vault at the destination.
interface_start_screen_msg_error_move_op: Can't move a currently open vault.
interface_start_screen_msg_failed_to_cre: Could not create vault at the given location. Please double check the location and permission.
interface_start_screen_msg_error_remove_: Can't remove a currently open vault.
interface_start_screen_option_connect_va: Create a synced vault on this device.
interface_start_screen_tooltip_own_vault: This is a remote vault owned by you.
interface_start_screen_tooltip_shared_va: This is a remote vault shared with you.
interface_start_up_obsidian_load_error: An error occurred while loading Obsidian.
interface_help_screen_label_official_hel: Read the official help documentation of Obsidian, available in multiple languages.
interface_help_screen_label_discord_chat: Discord is the best place to chat with other experienced Obsidian users from around the world.
interface_help_screen_label_forum_desc: Help each other, post feature requests, report bugs, and have in-depth discussions about knowledge management.
interface_help_screen_label_sandbox_vaul: Play around and experiment with various features. Please note your changes will not be saved.
commands_follow_cursor_link: कर्सर के नीचे लिंक को फॉलो करे
commands_open_cursor_link_in_new_tab: Open link under cursor in new tab
commands_open_cursor_link_to_the_right: Open link under cursor to the right
commands_open_cursor_link_in_new_window: Open link under cursor in new window
commands_navigate_tab_left: Focus on tab group to the left
commands_navigate_tab_right: Focus on tab group to the right
commands_search_replace_current_file: वर्तमान फ़ाइल में खोजें और बदलें
commands_toggle_default_new_tab_mode: Toggle default mode for new tabs
commands_toggle_fold_properties: Toggle fold properties in current file
commands_toggle_fold: करंट लाइन पर फोल्ड टॉगल करे
commands_fold_all: सब हैडिंग और लिस्ट को बंद करे
commands_unfold_all: सब हैडिंग और लिस्ट को खोले
commands_toggle_bold: चयन के लिए बोल्ड टॉगल करें
commands_toggle_italics: चयन के लिए इटैलिक टॉगल करें
commands_toggle_highlight: चयन के लिए हाइलाइट टॉगल करें
commands_toggle_preview: एडिट / प्रीव्यू मोड को टॉगल करे
commands_move_to_new_window: Move current pane to new window
commands_open_in_new_window: Open current pane in new window
dialogue_label_link_affected: यह {{links}} को इन {{files}} मैं प्रभावित करेगा।
dialogue_label_confirm_update_link_to_fi: क्या आप इंटरनल लिंक्स को अपडेट करना चाहते हैं जो इस फाइल से जुड़े है?
dialogue_label_confirm_deletion: क्या आप पक्का इसे नष्ट करना चाहते हैं "{{filename}}"?
dialogue_label_move_to_system_trash: इसे आपके सिस्टम ट्रैश में ले जाया जाएगा।
dialogue_label_move_to_vault_trash: इसे आपके ओब्सीडियन ट्रैश में ले जाया जाएगा जो की आपके ".trash" छिपा फ़ोल्डर में स्थित है।
dialogue_label_permanent_delete: ये फाइल हमेशा के लिए नष्ट हो जायेगा।
dialogue_label_delete_folder_warning: अगर आप आगे बढ़ेंगे तोह इस फोल्डर के अंदर सब फाइल्स नष्ट होजाएंग।
dialogue_button_delete_do_not_ask_again: नष्ट करो और वापिस मत पूछो
dialogue_label_existing_backlink: अभी के लिए इस नोट की ओर {{links}} संकेत हैं।
dialogue_label_existing_backlink_plural: There are currently {{links}} pointing to this note.
plugins_file_explorer_desc: See all the files in your vault.
plugins_file_explorer_action_create_note: Create new note in current tab
plugins_file_explorer_action_reveal_acti: Reveal active file in file explorer
plugins_file_explorer_command_make_a_cop: Make a copy of the current file
plugins_file_explorer_label_sort_a_to_z: Sort by file name (A to Z)
plugins_file_explorer_label_sort_z_to_a: Sort by file name (Z to A)
plugins_file_explorer_label_sort_new_to_: Sort by edit time (new to old)
plugins_file_explorer_label_sort_old_to_: Sort by edit time (old to new)
plugins_file_explorer_msg_invalid_charac: File name cannot contain any of the following characters:
plugins_file_explorer_msg_unsafe_charact: Links will not work with file names containing any of these characters:
plugins_file_explorer_msg_file_already_e: There's already a file with the same name
plugins_file_explorer_msg_bad_dotfile: File name must not start with a dot.
plugins_file_explorer_msg_set_attachment: Attachments will be saved to "{{path}}" from now on.
plugins_search_desc: Search for keyword in all the notes.
plugins_search_option_show_path_descript: Display full path of the file rather than just the file name.
plugins_search_option_link_style_descrip: Optionally turn each file result in to a link.
plugins_search_option_list_prefix_descri: Optionally add a list item prefix to each file result.
plugins_quick_switcher_desc: Jump to any files without leaving your keyboard. Ctrl/Cmd+O to activate.
plugins_quick_switcher_label_no_note_cre: No notes found. Enter to create a new one.
plugins_quick_switcher_prompt_type_file_: Type file to switch to or create...
plugins_quick_switcher_tooltip_not_creat: Not created yet, select to create
plugins_quick_switcher_option_show_exist: Whether to show links to files that are not yet created.
plugins_quick_switcher_option_show_attac: Show attachment files like images, videos, and PDFs.
plugins_quick_switcher_option_show_all_f: Show all files including ones that Obsidian can't open. The file will be opened with the default app for that file type.
plugins_graph_view_desc: See a graph overview of which notes link to which.
plugins_graph_view_option_depth_descript: Show nodes this number of links away
plugins_graph_view_option_show_tags_desc: Tags are linked to the files that contain them
plugins_graph_view_option_show_existing_: When checked, links to nonexistent files are not shown
plugins_graph_view_option_show_orphans_d: Show files that are not linked to any other file
plugins_graph_view_tooltip_click_to_chan:
Click to change color
Drag to reorder groups
plugins_backlinks_desc: स्टेटस बार में बैकलिंक्स की संख्या दिखाएं।
plugins_backlinks_action_open_for_curren: वर्तमान फ़ाइल के लिए बैकलिंक्स खोलें
plugins_backlinks_option_backlink_in_doc: Show backlinks in document by default when opening new panes.
plugins_outgoing_links_desc: Show outgoing links and detect unlinked mentions of other notes in the current note.
plugins_outgoing_links_action_open_for_c: Open outgoing links for the current file
plugins_tag_pane_desc: Displays all your tags and along with their number of occurrences.
plugins_properties_desc: Show the metadata for your files.
plugins_page_preview_desc: Preview a note when hovering an internal link. Ctrl/Cmd + hover in editor mode.
plugins_page_preview_label_empty_note: "{{linktext}}" is not created yet. Click to create.
plugins_page_preview_label_require_mod: Require {{key}} to trigger page preview on hover
plugins_bookmarks_desc: Bookmark frequently used files and searches.
plugins_custom_css_desc: Reads "obsidian.css" in the vault and applies it.
plugins_custom_css_label_no_readme: This theme did not provide a README file.
plugins_custom_css_msg_load_error: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
plugins_custom_css_msg_now_using_theme: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.
plugins_command_palette_desc: Type a command to invoke it. No need to use the UI or remember the shortcut.
plugins_command_palette_option_add_new_p: Pinned commands will appear at the top of all commands when no search query is present.
plugins_markdown_format_importer_desc: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
plugins_markdown_format_importer_zettelk: Fixes "[[UID]]" links to full "[[UID File Name]]".
Fixes "[[UID]]" links and also beautify them "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
plugins_markdown_format_importer_msg_all: Warning: the importer will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
plugins_markdown_format_importer_msg_ove: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.
plugins_daily_notes_desc: Open today's daily note, or create one if not present.
plugins_daily_notes_msg_fail_format: Failed to create daily note. "{{format}}" is not a valid format.
plugins_daily_notes_msg_fail_folder: Failed to create daily note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
plugins_daily_notes_msg_fail_template_fi: Failed to create daily note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
plugins_daily_notes_msg_no_previous: There's no daily note before this one.
plugins_daily_notes_msg_no_next: There's no daily note after this one.
plugins_daily_notes_label_syntax_live_pr: Here is what it will look like:
plugins_daily_notes_option_new_file_loca: The folder path to create the new daily note.
plugins_daily_notes_option_template_desc: The file path to use as template.
plugins_daily_notes_option_open_on_start: Open your daily note automatically whenever you open this vault.
plugins_unique_note_creator_desc: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
plugins_unique_note_creator_option_new_f: The folder path to create the new unique note.
plugins_unique_note_creator_msg_folder_n: Failed to create unique note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
plugins_unique_note_creator_option_templ: The file path to use as template.
plugins_unique_note_creator_msg_template: Failed to create unique note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
plugins_unique_note_creator_msg_failed_t: Failed to generate a unique note with the format "{{format}}
plugins_random_note_desc: Opens a random note. Useful for reviewing and discovering.
plugins_outline_desc: Displays the outline of the current file or linked pane.
plugins_outline_action_open_for_current: Open outline of the current file
plugins_word_count_desc: Show word count in the status bar.
plugins_slides_desc: Present from Markdown. Use "---" to separate slides.
plugins_audio_recorder_desc: Record audio and save as attachment.
plugins_audio_recorder_msg_access_denied: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
plugins_audio_recorder_msg_pending_grant: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.
plugins_open_with_default_app_desc: डिफ़ॉल्ट ऐप में यह फ़ाइल खोलने के लिए बटन लगायें।
plugins_templates_desc: Insert template content from a folder of template files.
plugins_templates_option_template_folder: Files in this folder will be available as templates.
plugins_templates_option_template_date_f: {{date}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
You can also use {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} to override the format once.
plugins_templates_option_template_time_f: {{time}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
You can also use {{time:HH:mm}} to override the format once.
plugins_templates_msg_fail_invalid_folde: Failed to list templates. Template folder is invalid.
plugins_templates_msg_fail_folder_not_fo: Failed to list templates. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
plugins_templates_msg_no_folder_set: Failed to list templates. No template folder configured.
plugins_translucency_desc: Turn on translucency effect to enhance a sense of depth. Best used with dark mode. Not supported on Linux.
plugins_slash_command_desc: Enable the ability to trigger slash commands in the editor by typing the forward slash.
plugins_editor_status_desc: Adds a status bar item to show and change the current editor mode.
plugins_publish_desc: Publish your notes through Obsidian Publish.
plugins_publish_label_no_internet_access: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
plugins_publish_label_publish_service_de: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
plugins_publish_label_please_login: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
plugins_publish_label_no_publish_subscri: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
plugins_publish_label_delete_site_confir: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
plugins_publish_label_delete_site_detail: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
plugins_publish_option_site_id_descripti: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lower case letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
plugins_publish_msg_invalid_site_id: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
plugins_publish_msg_site_id_in_use: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
plugins_publish_msg_create_site_issue: That was an issue when creating your site.
plugins_publish_option_site_name_descrip: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
plugins_publish_option_home_page_file_de: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
plugins_publish_option_logo_description: Pick an image file as your site logo.
plugins_publish_option_logo_placeholder: Any any uploaded image in your vault...
plugins_publish_option_customize_navigat: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
plugins_publish_option_hide_items_in_nav: Hide pages or folders from navigation
Right click and select "Hide" to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
plugins_publish_label_navigation_modal_d: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
plugins_publish_option_theme_description: Choose default color scheme for your site.
plugins_publish_option_show_theme_toggle: Let the visitor toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
plugins_publish_option_show_navigation_d: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
plugins_publish_option_show_search_descr: Display a search bar at top of the navigation that lets the visitors search pages and headings on your site.
plugins_publish_option_show_graph_descri: Display a small local graph on each page.
plugins_publish_option_show_outline_desc: Display the outline of headings on each page.
plugins_publish_option_show_backlinks_de: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
plugins_publish_option_sliding_window_mo: Open pages in new panes to the right. Allows scrolling through panes horizontally.
plugins_publish_option_hover_preview_fil: Display page preview when hovering links.
plugins_publish_option_hide_title_descri: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
plugins_publish_option_readable_line_len: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
plugins_publish_option_site_password_des: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
plugins_publish_option_google_analytics_: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
plugins_publish_tooltip_add_linked: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
plugins_publish_msg_no_permission_to_pub: You do not have permissions to publish to the current site.
plugins_publish_msg_select_at_least_one_: Please select at least one file.
plugins_publish_label_clear_cache: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
plugins_publish_label_visit_site: You can visit your site here:
plugins_publish_msg_something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please check the developer console for details.
plugins_publish_label_no_password: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
plugins_publish_label_have_password: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
plugins_publish_option_password_desc: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
plugins_publish_option_nickname_desc: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
plugins_publish_option_custom_domain_des: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
plugins_publish_option_noindex_desc: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
plugins_publish_option_custom_url_desc: The URL that your site will be located at.
plugins_publish_option_custom_url_redire: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
plugins_publish_label_custom_domain_inst: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.
plugins_publish_label_sharing_with_users: This site is currently shared with the following people.
plugins_publish_label_not_sharing: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
plugins_publish_error_email_must_be_vali: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
plugins_publish_msg_enable_publish_plugi: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
plugins_publish_label_leave_site_confirm: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
plugins_publish_label_confirm_override_1: Are you sure you want to override the local version?
plugins_publish_label_confirm_override_2: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
plugins_publish_message_successfully_use: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
plugins_publish_option_included_folders_: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
plugins_publish_option_excluded_folders_: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
plugins_publish_label_add_included_folde: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
plugins_workspaces_msg_enter_name: Please enter a name for the new layout.
plugins_sync_desc: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
plugins_sync_msg_already_latest_version: This version is already the latest version.
plugins_sync_label_no_earlier_version: There was no earlier versions of this file.
plugins_sync_label_click_to_see_history: Click on a deleted file to see its history.
plugins_sync_label_remote_vault_explanat: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
plugins_sync_option_vault_name_desc: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
plugins_sync_option_use_custom_encryptio: If you turn this off, we will securely manage an encryption key for you.
This option cannot be changed later.
plugins_sync_option_encryption_password_: This password cannot be changed later.
If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
This does not affect your local data.
plugins_sync_label_rename_remote_vault_d: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
plugins_sync_label_confirm_delete_remote: Are you sure you want to delete this remote vault?
All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
This action is permanent and irreversible.
plugins_sync_label_not_remote_vaults: You don't have any remote vaults.
plugins_sync_options_only_show_errors_de: Only show errors and hide other log items.
plugins_sync_label_third_party_sync_warn: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
plugins_sync_label_icloud_drive_warning: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
plugins_sync_option_remote_vault_desc_co: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
plugins_sync_option_remote_vault_desc_no: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
plugins_sync_option_device_name_desc: This name will be displayed in the sync log. Leave empty to use the default name.
plugins_sync_option_sync_log_desc: View recent sync activities for debugging.
plugins_sync_option_over_size_desc: Your vault is at {{size}} out of {{limit}}.
plugins_sync_msg_largest_files_desc: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
plugins_sync_tooltip_purge_remote: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
plugins_sync_option_prevent_sleep_desc: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
plugins_sync_option_excluded_folder_desc: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
plugins_sync_option_sync_image_desc: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins_sync_option_sync_audio_desc: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins_sync_option_sync_video_desc: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins_sync_option_view_config_files_de: View and restore version history of setting files.
plugins_sync_option_sync_app_desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, custom hotkeys, etc.
plugins_sync_option_sync_appearance_desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
plugins_sync_option_sync_appearance_data: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
plugins_sync_option_sync_core_plugin_des: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
plugins_sync_option_sync_community_plugi: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
plugins_sync_label_sync_introduction: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
plugins_sync_label_account_required: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
plugins_sync_label_number_of_folders_exc: {{folders}} are currently excluded from being synced.
plugins_sync_label_add_excluded_folder_d: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
plugins_sync_msg_vault_has_notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
plugins_sync_msg_vault_merge_warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
plugins_sync_tooltip_update_setting_on_a: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
plugins_sync_label_sharing_with_users: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people.
plugins_sync_label_not_sharing: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.
plugins_sync_label_leave_vault_confirmat: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
plugins_sync_label_require_subscription_: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
plugins_sync_option_contact_support_desc: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
plugins_sync_msg_remote_vault_limit_hit: Obsidian Sync lets you create up to 5 remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please remove an existing one.
plugins_file_recovery_desc: Let you restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
plugins_file_recovery_option_interval_de: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
plugins_file_recovery_option_keep_descri: Length in days snapshots is kept for.
plugins_file_recovery_label_clear_warnin: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Note that only snapshots will be removed. All files inside your vault will not be affected.
plugins_file_recovery_label_select_file: Please select a file on the left to view snapshots.
plugins_note_composer_option_split_repla: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
plugins_note_composer_option_template_fi: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
plugins_note_composer_command_merge_file: Merge current file with another file...
plugins_note_composer_label_confirm_file: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
plugins_note_composer_msg_fail_to_fetch_: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.
plugins_canvas_desc: Arrange and connect notes on an infinite canvas.
plugins_canvas_action_create_with_size: Create a card with specific size
plugins_canvas_action_drag_to_add_note: Drag to add note from vault
plugins_canvas_action_drag_to_add_media: Drag to add media from vault
plugins_canvas_label_export_png_desc: Export "{{title}}" with a PNG file with the settings below.
plugins_canvas_option_new_canvas_locatio: Default location for new canvas files
Where newly created canvas files are placed.
plugins_canvas_option_new_canvas_folder_: Folder to create new canvas files in
Newly created canvas files will appear under this folder.
plugins_canvas_option_snap_to_grid_desc: Snap cards to the background grid when moving and resizing.
plugins_canvas_option_snap_to_objects_de: Snap cards to nearby objects when moving and resizing.
plugins_canvas_option_zoom_breakpoint: Zoom threshold for hiding card content
plugins_canvas_option_zoom_breakpoint_de: Lower values will increase performance but hide card content sooner when zooming out.
plugins_canvas_option_export_png_show_lo: This will add an Obsidian logo to the bottom left.
plugins_canvas_option_export_png_privacy: This will obscure any text on your canvas.
plugins_canvas_option_export_png_zoom_de: A higher zoom will generate a higher resolution image.
plugins_canvas_option_export_png_frame_d: Choose to render the entire canvas or just the current visible viewport.
plugins_canvas_label_drag_from_below: Drag from below or double click
plugins_canvas_label_longpress: Touch and hold to add / move / select
pdf_action_reveal_in_outline: Reveal page in table of contents
properties_label_migration_warning_desc: Are you sure you want to change the type? Some of the data associated with this property key is incompatible.
